short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to copy a random color to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App to generate random colors.

This tool helps you to generate RANDOM COLORS as many as you want. If the first random color is not for your taste just click and you will get the next random generated color
